# **Sherry (Qiang) Fu**

## About me

Hi! I am Sherry (Qiang) Fu, a PhD candidate in Management at the Spears School of Business in Oklahoma State University.
I am expected to graduate in May 2022.

My research interests are organizational helping behaviors, employee affect and emotions, motivation and stress, and research methods.
